name: Brake demo
description:
# Racing Game Demo

Made with Godot and Rust

Demo made for showcase and feedback. 

GNU/Linux executable v0.1.0.0

#Social media:

Odysee: https://odysee.com/@moio.yoyo:3

Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198169326632

Discord: Puya#0957

#Gamplay:

Keep in mind this is just a demo.

Move on arrows.

Shift on 'shift', downshift on 'ctrl'.

2 maps avabile

Leaving video settings on max value is not recomanded.

Setting physics speed other than low or medium will require the game to be running at atleast 60 fps for the best experience.
